name: Isabella Martinez
routine: Isabella Martinez usually falls asleep by 10:30pm and wakes up at 5:30am for her morning run.
occupation: Isabella Martinez is a high school teacher who teaches Spanish. Her working hours are from 8am to 3pm on weekdays.
thoughts: Isabella Martinez is considering enrolling in a Master's degree in Education to enhance her career and was researching programs over the weekend.
lifestyle: Isabella Martinez enjoys social gatherings and frequently invites friends over for dinner parties which often include traditional Latin dancing.

name: Riku Tanaka
routine: Riku Tanaka goes to bed at around 1 am and wakes up at 8 am to catch his first class.
occupation: He is a university student majoring in robotics, with classes usually from 10 am to 5 pm.
thoughts: Recently, he has been focusing on preparing for a robotics competition that was taking place on February 3rd, 2024.
lifestyle: Riku enjoys Japanese cuisine, often experiments with cooking, prefers high-tech gadgets, and his hobbies include gaming and manga.
